entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain. Wind southeast 30 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia this morning and early this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 9.
